narrative.narrative: Southern Air is a cargo airline with hubs at Cincinatti/Northern Kentucky,Anchorage in Alaska and at Leipzig/Halle in Germany. At January 2015 it had four 777F's which operate under contract for DHL since 2011. It has two 747-400F's and a 747-400ERF and four 737-400's. It has used the 200 series 747 in the past mostly and had a few 300's also. It has contracts with Korean Airlines,Lufthansa Cargo,MASkargo,Ethiopian Airlines,Saudia,TNT,UPS seasonally,Centurian Air Crago and the US Department of Defense in also as mentioned before DHL. It was founded in March 1999 from assets of Southern Air Transport. In September 2007 it merged with Seattle based cargo airline Cargo 360 after Southern's owner Oak Hill Capital Partners bouth that airline.
